templates.title: PortaBI
templates.description: 222222  A user-friendly business intelligence tool, analyzing live data and reporting it all in a meaningful way.
templates.note: Please fill the fields below before installing the application.

env.name: SFTP_URL
env.label: Sftp URL
env.description: Sftp URL

env.name: SFTP_LOGIN
env.label: Sftp login
env.description: Sftp login

env.name: PB_ADMIN_URL
env.label: Admin URL
env.description: Porta Billing Admin URL

env.name: DB_DSN
env.label: DB DSN
env.description: Database DSN

env.name: DB_USER
env.label: DB User
env.description: Database Username

env.name: DB_PASSWORD
env.label: DB Password
env.description: Database Password

env.name: I_ENV
env.label: PB Environment ID
env.description: Porta Billing Env ID associated with the current service

env.name: SSH_KEY
env.label: SSH Key for sftp connection
env.description: SSH Key for sftp connection

templates.title: BALogsUI
templates.description: Grafana interface (an open source analytics & monitoring solution providing easy access (search, download) to the BillingAdmin logs). Please note that this version of the service is not compatible with BillingAdmin in releases starting from MR107-0. Please use BALogsUIOpenSearch instead
templates.note: Please complete all the fields (like 'Elasticsearch URL') before installing the application

env.name: ELASTICSEARCH_URL
env.label: Elasticsearch URL
env.description: The URL of the Elasticsearch instance where BA logs data is stored. Format: http://{ip}:{port}. Example: http://10.0.2.15:9200

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_LOGIN
env.label: Default user login
env.description: The default user login for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_PASSWORD
env.label: Default user password
env.description: TheThe default user password for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DOMAIN_NAME_FOR_UI
env.label: Domain name for Grafana
env.description: The domain name of the server where Grafana is deployed (will be used to generate the SSL certificate)

env.name: CONFIGURATOR_IP
env.label: A private IP address of the Confguration server
env.description: Any private Configurator's private IP address required for Nginx authorization

templates.title: BALogsUIOpenSearch
templates.description: 3333_TEST Grafana interface (an open source analytics & monitoring solution providing easy access (search, download) to the BillingAdmin logs)
templates.note: Please complete all the fields (like 'OpenSearch URL') before installing the application

env.name: OPENSEARCH_URL
env.label: OpenSearch URL
env.description: The URL of the OpenSearch instance where BA logs data is stored. Format: http://{ip}:{port}. Example: http://10.0.2.15:9200

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_LOGIN
env.label: Default user login
env.description: The default user login for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_PASSWORD
env.label: Default user password
env.description: TheThe default user password for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DOMAIN_NAME_FOR_UI
env.label: Domain name for Grafana
env.description: The domain name of the server where Grafana is deployed (will be used to generate the SSL certificate)

env.name: CONFIGURATOR_IP
env.label: A private IP address of the Confguration server
env.description: Any private Configurator's private IP address required for Nginx authorization

templates.title: BALogsSupervisor
templates.description: 555 The service for reindexing and removing old BillingAdmin logs stored in the OpenSearch
templates.note: Please complete all the mandatory fields (like 'OpenSearch Node') before installing the application

env.name: ES_NODES
env.label: OpenSearch Node
env.description: The OpenSearch master node where logs will be saved. Format: {ip}:{port}. Example: 10.0.2.15:9200

env.name: LOGS_CLEANUP_DAYS
env.label: Logs cleanup days
env.description: Delete logs that were saved more than N days ago

env.name: SUPERVISOR_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT_MIN
env.label: Processing timeout (minutes)
env.description: Try to delete/reindex logs every N minutes

templates.title: BALogsExporter
templates.description: 666 The service for collecting logs from a BillingAdmin node and saving them in the OpenSearch
templates.note: Please complete all the mandatory fields (like 'OpenSearch Node') before installing the application

env.name: ES_NODES
env.label: OpenSearch Node
env.description: The OpenSearch master node where logs will be saved. Format: {ip}:{port}. Example: 10.0.2.15:9200

env.name: EXPORTER_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT_SEC
env.label: Processing timeout (seconds)
env.description: Try to collect/save logs every N seconds

templates.title: API v2
templates.description: The service for providing a next generation application programming interface (API) on BillingAdmin nodes

env.name: REPLICAS
env.label: Number of BillingAdmin nodes
env.description: Ensure that the service runs on every BillingAdmin node

env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.label: Log level
env.description: Defines the log level for the service. Possible values: error, warning, info, debug
